name: Market-Entry-Evaluator
description: Evaluates if a product is ready for entry into a new market using multi-agent LLM analysis.
parameters: --var product_name='SparkAI Workbench' --var current_market='US' --var target_market='Europe' --var industry_vertical='Manufacturing' --var customer_type='Enterprise' --var go_to_market_model='Sales-led' --var unique_selling_points='Agentic automation, Drag-and-drop workflows, LLM orchestration'

nodes.name: Market Alignment Evaluator
nodes.description: This node enables standalone or dataframe-optional LLM queries across multiple providers (OpenAI, Bedrock, Gemini). It is designed for sequential agent flows like 'Similar Company Finder' and supports saving structured responses.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: customPrompt
fields.value:
You are a market analyst. Given a product_name='${product_name}', current_market='${current_market}', target_market='${target_market}', industry_vertical='${industry_vertical}', customer_type='${customer_type}', and go_to_market_model='${go_to_market_model}', assess whether the product is aligned with the new market. Output JSON:
{
  "market_alignment_score": "number (0-100)",
  "barriers": ["string"],
  "growth_potential": "string",
  "notes": "string"
}
Do not include any text outside of the JSON.

fields.description: Custom prompt to instruct the model.

nodes.name: Verdict Generator
nodes.description: This node enables standalone or dataframe-optional LLM queries across multiple providers (OpenAI, Bedrock, Gemini). It is designed for sequential agent flows like 'Similar Company Finder' and supports saving structured responses.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: customPrompt
fields.value:
You are a go-to-market strategist. Given prior agent outputs including market_alignment_score, competitor overlap, and growth_potential, give a final verdict on market entry. Output JSON:
{
  "verdict": "string",
  "confidence_score": "number",
  "recommendation_notes": ["string"]
}
Return only the JSON object.

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
1) Market Alignment Evaluation

  1. Assesses if the given product fits the target market.
  2. Considers product name, current & target markets, industry vertical, customer type, and GTM model.
  3. Outputs: market_alignment_score, barriers, growth_potential, and notes.


2) Competitor Analysis

  1. Identifies top competitors in the target market and evaluates overlap.
  2. Based on product name, industry vertical, and target market.
  3. Outputs: List of competitors with overlap_score and positioning.


3) Final GTM Verdict

  1. Combines insights from alignment and competition analysis.
  2. Outputs a final verdict on market entry with confidence_score and recommendation_notes.
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Comments for the Workflow
